meanings.definition: Of or relating to Arabia or its people.
meanings.sent1: The traditional clothing had intricate Arabic designs.
meanings.sent2: The Arabic music filled the air with its melodious tunes.
meanings.sent3: The Arabic spices added a flavorful twist to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her Arabic hospitality made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent5: The Arabic architecture showcased intricate patterns and designs.

meanings.definition: The Semitic language of the Arabs, spoken by over 300 million people in 22 countries.
meanings.sent1: Learning Arabic can open up new opportunities for communication.
meanings.sent2: She studied Arabic to better understand the culture of the region.
meanings.sent3: The parrot surprised everyone by speaking fluent Arabic.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed like poetry in the beautiful Arabic language.
meanings.sent5: The Arabic script looked like a work of art on the ancient scrolls.
